section.title: The Input Package
section.para: The Input package provides a number of classes that can be used as an alternative to using the static calls of the JRequest class. The package comprises of four classes, JInput and three sub-classes extended from it: JInputCli, JInputCookie and JInputFiles. An input object is generally owned by the application and explicitly added to an application class as a public property, such as can be found in JApplication, JApplicationCli and JApplicationDaemon.
All classes in this package are supported by the auto-loader so can be invoked at any time.
